com.jinengo.reporting.controller.api.platform
Class PlatformApiController

java.lang.Object
  com.jinengo.reporting.controller.api.platform.PlatformApiController

@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/api/platform")
public class PlatformApiController
extends java.lang.Object

Jinengo REST-API to deliver BI-Data to Client Applications via JSON-Response Every URL Request {BaseUrl}/api/platform is mapped to this controller

Author:
lars schuettemeyer
